company_context: IBM StreamSets Real-time streaming with IBM StreamSets Streaming data pipelines that enhance real-time decision-making and mitigate risks Try it free Explore the interactive demo IBM is named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Data Integration Tools Learn more Seamless hybrid and multicloud data integration IBM® StreamSets enables users to create and manage smart streaming data pipelines through an intuitive graphical interface, facilitating seamless data integration across hybrid and multicloud environments. This capability is why leading global companies rely on IBM StreamSets to support millions of data pipelines for modern analytics, intelligent applications and hybrid integration. Access real-time streaming integration capabilities within IBM watsonx.data integration. A unified control plane enables you to build reusable pipelines by using any integration style and data type, reducing reliance on specialized tools and helping ensure resilience to shifts in data technology. Explore IBM watsonx.data integration Benefits Enable real-time data ingestion, at scale Decrease data staleness and enable real-time data at scale, handling millions of records of data, across thousands of pipelines within seconds. Reduce data drift with intelligent data pipelines​ Insulate data pipelines from change and unexpected shifts with drag-and-drop, prebuilt processors designed to automatically identify and adapt to data drift. Stream your data in any format that you choose Create streaming pipelines to ingest structured, semistructured or unstructured data and deliver it to a wide range of destinations. Leverage a drag-and-drop user interface ​ Leverage a single low-code user interface that designs and deploys smart data pipelines for streaming data without hand coding.​ Enable deployment flexibility wherever your data resides Deploy our SaaS solution on AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and run workloads in your cloud provider, virtual private cloud (VPC) or local infrastructure. Harness enterprise-scale productivity with Python SDK Streamline pipeline creation and deployment with Python SDK​. Leverage templates and a blend of GUI tools to make data accessibility more inclusive. Use cases Fraud detection and risk management Fraud detection and risk management Customer 360 and personalization Customer 360 and personalization Event processing for operational intelligence Event processing for operational intelligence Streaming data for AI Streaming data for AI Fraud detection and risk management Fortify your organization against fraud Safeguard your organization from fraud with real-time insights from IBM StreamSets. It seamlessly aggregates transactional, behavioral and external threat data, feeding it into analytics engines to detect anomalies at scale. By enhancing risk models, improving regulatory compliance and reducing potential losses through timely informed action, organizations can fortify their defenses against financial crimes. Read

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi [CTO Name], this is Alex from DeepData AI. I know you're likely swamped, so I'll be brief. We help CTOs like yourself significantly reduce data processing times and improve real-time analytics, even across complex hybrid and multicloud environments. I saw IBM StreamSets mentioned as a key part of your data integration strategy, and I believe we can complement that very effectively.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, thanks for reaching out, but frankly, we're pretty happy with our current setup, especially with IBM StreamSets. It’s robust, handles our streaming needs well, and we’ve already invested heavily in it. We’re not looking for another data processing solution right now.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand, [CTO Name]. IBM StreamSets is a solid platform, and it's great you're leveraging leaders like IBM for your data integration. What I often hear from CTOs using solutions like StreamSets is that while the integration is streamlined, the *processing* of that streaming data for deeper, more advanced analytics or AI models can still be a bottleneck. Are you experiencing any challenges in getting that processed data into a truly actionable state for your intelligent applications or modern analytics quickly enough?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: "Bottleneck" is a strong word. We have our methods. Look, the reality is, we’re in the middle of a major cloud migration. Adding another new tool, another integration point, is just not feasible from a resource or timeline perspective. We’ve got enough on our plate.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That’s a very valid point about the migration, [CTO Name]. And that's precisely where DeepData AI can be a surprising fit. Our solution is designed for *minimal disruption*. We don't require a complete overhaul of your existing pipelines. Think of it as an accelerator layer that sits alongside StreamSets, or even integrates with your cloud migration efforts. We specialize in taking that data StreamSets prepares and making it AI-ready in a fraction of the time, so your analytics and applications can get value much faster without you needing to re-architect everything. Many of our clients have found it complements their existing IBM investments rather than replacing them.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Okay, an "accelerator layer" sounds nice in theory, but what are we talking about in terms of implementation complexity and, frankly, cost? We’re already spending a significant amount with IBM, and we need to see a clear ROI before considering anything else. Plus, we’ve had issues with integration in the past with other solutions.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Those are excellent and common concerns, [CTO Name]. For implementation, we pride ourselves on our speed and ease of integration, often requiring minimal changes to existing infrastructure. We can deploy on any cloud provider you're using for your migration. Regarding ROI, we typically see our clients reduce their data processing costs by 30-40% and see a 2x to 5x improvement in data latency for AI/ML workloads. We’ve actually seen clients like yours, who are leaders in their industry and use tools like IBM StreamSets, achieve these results within months. I'd love to show you exactly how this works with a tailored demo, perhaps focusing on a specific use case relevant to your migration or analytics goals. We can also set you up with a limited-time trial so you can see the performance uplift firsthand.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alright, let's schedule that demo. I'll give you 30 minutes next Tuesday at 10 AM your time. Make it worth my while.

analysis.raw:
Score: 8
Outcome: Success
Key_Objection: Integration
Feedback: While the seller effectively addressed objections, they could have probed deeper into the specific integration challenges the buyer faced with previous solutions to build more trust. Sentiment: Positive
